posts.text: 写权限系统springboot 连接MySQL的时候报错The server time zone value ‘ÖÐ¹ú±ê×¼Ê±¼ä’ is unrec报错 1java.sql.SQLException: The server time zone value 'ÖÐ¹ú±ê×¼Ê±¼ä' is unrecognized or represents more than one time zone. You must configure either the server or JDBC driver (via the serverTimezone configuration property) to use a more specifc time zone value if you want to utilize time zone support. 1ps:通过在csdn搜索,发现主要办法有两个解决办法 方法1.在语句”jdbc:mysql://localhost:3366/stujdbc “后添加 ?serverTimezone=GMT%2B8 方法2.更改MySQL中的系统时间(修改my.cnf实现永久修改) 12345vi /etc/mysql/my.cnf然后在mysqld下边的配置中添加一行：default-time_zone = '+8:00'然后重启mysqlservice mysql restart`
